title: Smooth Scroll Story
description: Parallax sections with Lenis smooth scrolling and GSAP ScrollTrigger choreography.

title: Horizontal Scroll Gallery
description: Vertical scroll drives a horizontal gallery with pinned container and panel entrance animations.

title: Text Reveal on Scroll
description: Per-character and per-line text animations triggered on scroll with GSAP SplitText.

title: Pinned Scroll Sections
description: Sections pin in place while multi-step timelines play, driven entirely by scroll position.

title: Card Stack Cascade
description: Stacked cards fan out and rearrange into a grid as you scroll, driven by GSAP ScrollTrigger scrub.

title: Scroll Progress Indicators
description: Three simultaneous scroll indicators: top bar, circular SVG progress, and section dot navigator.

title: Particle Tunnel
description: Cinematic depth-heavy particle tunnel with custom shaders and bloom post-processing.

title: 3D Product Showcase
description: Interactive 3D product viewer with PBR materials, three-point lighting, and orbit controls.

title: Shader Background
description: Full-screen GLSL fragment shader with layered simplex noise creating flowing aurora bands.

title: Interactive 3D Mouse Scene
description: Grid of 400 spheres with mouse-reactive repulsion physics, spring return, and distance-based color.

title: Card Grid Transition
description: Shared-element transition from a card grid to a detail page using the View Transitions API.

title: Page Routing Transitions
description: SPA-style page routing with directional slide transitions using the View Transitions API.

title: Theme Transition
description: Dark/light theme toggle with circular clip-path wipe powered by the View Transitions API.

title: Image Gallery Transitions
description: Thumbnail strip with hero image swap animated by View Transitions crossfade and scale.

title: Bokeh Particle Hero
description: Ambient glowing bokeh particle field with mouse-reactive parallax and depth-of-field blur.

title: Magnetic Cursor
description: Custom cursor with spring-based following and magnetic attraction to interactive elements.

title: Spotlight Reveal
description: Mouse-driven spotlight that reveals colorful hidden content through a dark overlay using CSS masks.

title: Noise & Grain Overlay
description: Four composited overlay effects: SVG noise filter, canvas grain, CSS scanlines, and radial vignette.

title: Staggered Grid Entrance
description: Grid items animate in with position-based stagger delays. Multiple animation styles: fade, scale, slide, flip.

title: Morphing Blobs
description: Three approaches to organic shape animation: CSS border-radius, SVG path morphing, and Canvas bezier curves.

title: Scroll Camera Narrative
description: Scroll through story chapters as the camera flies between 3D scene waypoints with cinematic transitions.

title: 3D Product Spotlight
description: Scroll-driven camera orbits a 3D product on rails, revealing feature cards at each angle.
